text:
Hi, I am try to add a validator node to the network but I am getting following error,
> 1. participant : "INDEX_DB_SQL_NON_TRANSIENT_ERROR(4,0): Processing the request failed due to a non-transient database error: ERROR: relation \"lapi_events_party_to_participant\" does not exist\n  Position
> 2. validator : Request (tid:6af480d1b3e788398651929391c20836) com.digitalasset.canton.topology.admin.v30.TopologyManagerWriteService/Authorize to participant:5002: failed with FAILED_PRECONDITION/SERIAL_MISMATCH(9,6af480d1): The given serial 2 did not match the expected serial 1.
Any solution
